description: Audio manifest for Georgian learning app. This file tracks available audio assets.

letters.note: Add audio files to public/audio/letters/ directory. File naming: [letter].mp3

words.description: Vocabulary word pronunciations organized by lesson
words.note: Add audio files to public/audio/words/[lessonId]/ directory. File naming: [normalized-word].mp3

phrases.description: Example sentence pronunciations organized by lesson
phrases.note: Add audio files to public/audio/phrases/[lessonId]/ directory. File naming: [normalized-phrase].mp3

minPairs.description: Minimal pair audio for sound discrimination practice
minPairs.note: Add audio files to public/audio/min-pairs/ directory

ejectivePractice.note: Add audio files to public/audio/ejective-practice/ directory

instructions.setup: 1. Record or source native Georgian audio files
instructions.placement: 2. Place files in appropriate directories according to structure above
instructions.validation: 4. Audio files will automatically be detected and used when present
instructions.fallback: 5. If audio file is missing, app will fallback to text-to-speech
